home.name: Kerly Sarrias
home.description: Web Developer with a creative soul, analytical mind, and a cup of coffee always nearby. Software Engineering student focused on building experiences that blend design, technology, and purpose.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.description: My transition from the agro-industrial sector to web development allowed me to combine analysis, organization, and creativity to build complete digital solutions. I work with React, TypeScript, Node.js, Java, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and more, both in frontend and backend. I'm proactive, curious, and passionate about turning ideas into functional experiences that deliver real value.

jobs.title: Freelance Developer
jobs.description: I have developed custom e-commerce platforms using React, Next.js, and Tailwind, integrating SQL databases and authentication systems. I have implemented key features such as shopping carts, payment gateways, and administrative panels for product and user management. Additionally, I work directly with clients to define requirements, perform iterative deliveries, and provide post-launch support.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Developed the landing page and implemented user interfaces using React and Next.js, enhancing the visual and interactive experience. Integrated Mercado Pago API for secure and efficient payments and set up a WordPress blog for easy content management.

jobs.title: Agroindustrial Engineer
jobs.description: Led work teams and coordinated production logistics in the specialty coffee area, managing continuous improvement projects, quality analysis, and process optimization in a collaborative and results-oriented environment.

education.title: Software Engineering
education.description: Training in software development, scalable systems, quality testing, and project management with a focus on innovation and teamwork.

education.title: Full Stack Web Development
education.description: Learned solid fundamentals in full stack web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, and databases, applying agile methodologies and best practices.

education.title: Advanced Full Stack Web Development
education.description: Learned advanced web development with React, microservices, authentication, databases, and Node.js, solving challenges in dynamic environments.

education.title: Full Stack Development
education.description: Training in front-end and back-end, strengthening technical skills, problem-solving, and collaborative work.

education.title: Agroindustrial Engineering
education.description: Developed analytical, research, and project management skills, standing out in communication and teamwork.

projects.title: Drinks
projects.description: Web application that allows you to search for cocktail and drink recipes through an external API, displaying ingredients, instructions, and visual data for each preparation. It integrates generative AI to search for cocktails using natural language.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Zustand, Tailwind CSS, and GitHub

projects.title: Legends
projects.description: Web application that allows you to record, view, filter, and manage popular legends from Costa Rica, categorized by location and type. It has an intuitive administration panel.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS, Python, FastApi, Cloudinary, JWT, and GitHub

projects.title: PetLab
projects.description: E-commerce web application developed collaboratively for a veterinary laboratory. The platform allows users to schedule clinical services and purchase veterinary products online.
projects.technologies: JavaScript, Java, Sprint Boot, Booststrap, and GitHub

projects.title: Gallery
projects.description: An interactive gallery for exploring images and videos by category. Includes expanded view and autoplay mode for a smooth and immersive browsing experience.
projects.technologies: React, Redux, REST API, Tailwind CSS

projects.title: Huila Travel
projects.description: A web platform for exploring and booking tourist destinations in the Huila region. Users can manage their profiles, create travel experiences, and discover new places.

projects.title: Social Net
projects.description: A functional social network where users can register, log in, create and manage profiles, post content, and follow others. Designed to encourage interaction and networking.
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: Pokedex
projects.description: A Pokédex-style web app that allows users to filter Pokémon by species number and view detailed information. Great for fans looking to explore the Pokémon universe.

projects.title: Rick and Morty App
projects.description: A web app that displays characters and episodes from the Rick and Morty TV series. Uses data from the official API to provide detailed information for fans.
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Node.js, MongoDB

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app that shows current conditions and forecasts for a given location. Useful for planning daily activities based on local weather.

projects.title: User App
projects.description: A CRUD web app for managing user data: create, read, update, and delete. Features a flexible backend with Sequelize, MongoDB, and MySQL.
projects.technologies: React, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, MySQL, MongoDB, Sequelize

contact.title: Let’s Talk About Your Project
contact.subtitle: Always open to freelance projects if the right opportunity comes along. Don’t hesitate to contact me.
